file_content.text: The Emperor.... Must feed the Emperor....
They were Imperial Guards after all.
Yes; the support team says their commandant's a raving madman.
We'll want to question him. Insane or not, he'll be of use to us....
They're ruining everything! I see it. We see. But they don't see. They don't even have eyes!
We're all that's left. We have to flush the others from this place. Only then can we wake the starving Emperor and grant him sustenance!
Oh, thanks. Now I'm hungry.
Identify yourselves.
Lord Wrath! It's Lord Wrath!
I'm Commandant Iven. We're the true Imperial Guard. We're here to serve the Emperor.
You serve me now.
Obey.
No, Wrath. Only the Emperor's will. The Emperor's needs!
Tell me what must be done.
Let me help you.
We must cleanse the temple of the Revanites. We have to prepare the Emperor's feast.
Commandant Iven. Imperial Guard. We serve the Emperor. And you....
You're not one of them. You're... meaningless. Meaningless. Go away. Go.
If anyone's leaving this place, it's you.
No.
We have to see it through. Through to the end.
I am a Dark Lord of the Sith, and you will address me as such.
You dare...?
It doesn't matter who you are. Even Sith. The Emperor! Only the Emperor.
I want to know what you're doing here. What are you planning?
Talk to me.
The Emperor wants to destroy all life, yours included. You know that, right?
The Emperor's insane.
We're food. All life was born to be his food. The glorious honor!
And you don't have to do anything, Wrath. Just let us sacrifice you in his name. Food for the Emperor!
You can't stop it! We won't let you!
Invaders! Interlopers! This world is off limits!
He told us from the start. Only the devoted! Only the purest! His orders, his command!
Stay calm. I didn't come here to hurt you.
I'm here to help.
Hurt me as much as you want! None of it matters now!
Are you talking about the Emperor?
Who is "he"?
Do not speak of him! You are cattle! Fodder for the greatness to come!
Great. Someone to question, and he's lost his mind.
So you're crazy, huh?
No, no, I see clearly! His sight can never be lost!
You were attacked by the followers of a man named Revan. Do you know where he's gone?
To the temple. And from there, the final steps are walked. We have failed, but so will he!
Plans within plans, always! This too has been foreseen! All possibilities are witnessed and adjusted for!
What are you talking about?
The end is inevitable. All will be devoured to fuel his transcendence. All nations, all worlds, all species!
You, me, Revan... none will survive!
My death serves his will, as all do. We are the fuel. Our sacrifice ignites his blazing glory!
I see you've made a new friend.
This man is the only survivor of Revan's attack. We need to take him back to the camp for questioning.
Then we will.
Return to the camp. We have much to discuss.
